contents:
哈哈哈我昨天去女友（川粉）家，跟女友闺蜜（白右川粉，QAnon粉丝）聊了一会。我跟她说你知道吗，在中国的社交媒体上很多人都在流传新冠肺炎病毒是美国人带到中国去的。

女友闺蜜：    
I mean it’s not totally impossible that this coronavirus thing is made in America. I think it’s a Deep State biological attack conducted against China in order to undermine the terms of the trade deal levied by Team Trump. This whole outbreak mayhem, here in the states, could actually be a Deep State false flag operation to discredit Trump, their latest anti-Trump effort after their crazy bullshit impeachment drama. Fear sells, you know.

我：你说得好有道理，我竟无言以对
